mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.author, b.is_reported, coalesce(r.report_flag, false) as report_flag, b.created_at from board_tb b left join report_tb r ON r.board_id = b.id
mapper.update: update board_tb set report_flag = ( case when report_flag = true then false when report_flag = false then true end ) where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ut.username, ut.nickname, stat.user_id, stat.bt_count, stat.ct_count from (select user_id, count(*) as bt_count, 0 as ct_count from board_tb group by user_id union all select user_id, 0 as bt_count, count(*) as ct_count from comment_tb group by user_id ) as stat join user_tb ut on stat.user_id = ut.id order by
bt_count,
bt_count desc,
ct_count,
ct_count desc,
ut.username
